entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Crash detection in build script is off-by-one #19703
  • Picker goes into infinite loop when updating ItemsSource ObservableCollection during SelectedIndex update #19702
  • Unexpected exception from VisualTreeElementExtensions.GetVisualTreeElements #19701
  • Caught exception in StartHotReloadAsync at 186: System.ArgumentNullException: Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'path1') #19699
  • Calls to retrieve large byte array in MAUI Android app never completes #19698
  • Entry Plain keyboard still autocorrects when using Microsoft SwiftKey #19696
  • FontImage not working as an IconImageSource for ToolbarItem on Windows. Regular image format works. #19695
  • [Testing] Push Rachel's Recipes and/or our manual testing app to the store #19692
    Backlog
  • Button VisualStates do not work #19690
  • Java.Lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: 'setSpan ( ... ) ends beyond length #19689
  • iOS Memory issue #19686

Closed

  • [macOS] `PointerEventArgs.GetPosition(relativeTo: view)` does not give correct values (absolute instead of relative ones?) #19329
    Backlog
  • A wait cursor is shown when a Maui application has been loaded in Windows #19661
  • Exception Occurs When Updating the Text of a Label Using Task.Run() #19666
  • I would like to know if Microsoft has abandoned MAUI? Is it still worthwhile for me to continue learning and using MAUI #19687
  • [Bug]: Android release crash, debug work as normal #14653

PullRequests

Created

  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 #19700
  • [Windows] Fix verification of test count in CI #19697

Merged

  • [net9.0] Enable trimming windows #19680
  • Stable version #19693
  • Modify `FlyoutHeaderAdaptsToMinimumHeight` test to work better on CI #19685
    area/testing
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19577
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Clean up async assertions #19385
  • [macOS] Fix `GesturePlatformManager.CalculatePosition` when asked for a relative position #19371
    community ✨, area/gestures
  • [net9.0] Enable tizen #19679
  • Clean up / Linq removal #19260
    area/animation 🎬, community ✨
  • Generalize HideSoftInputOnTapped on Android and iOS to support 3rd party input controls #19626
    community ✨
  • Fix TableView rendering on Android #19473
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨
  • [xamlg] improve error for Xamarin.Forms namespace #19683
    area/Xaml </>, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Add benchmarking class for PropertyMapper extensions #18660
  • [X] GetValueSource #19563
    do-not-merge, area/testing
  • [Android] Make Flyout footer aware of header/content margin #19303
    platform/android 🤖, area/shell 🐢
  • Added optional ReceiveSms permission #19659
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
